home.title: Home
home.description: I am offering different IT services to earn some money besides my school apprenticeship as an IT specialist.

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a 17 year old IT specialist apprentice from Switzerland. I am interested in web development and software development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can find some of my projects.

personal.title: personal website
personal.description: The website you are currently visiting was created with React and TypeScript.

fischlehrpfad.title: Fischlehrpfad Burgdorf
fischlehrpfad.description: The Fischlehrpfad Burgdorf is a website for a fish path in Burgdorf, Switzerland. It was the first website I created.

sgrumisberg.title: Sch√ºtzengesellschaft Rumisberg
sgrumisberg.description: This is a website for a shooting club. It was created with Grav. It also was my first customer project.

mgrumisberg.title: Musikgesellschaft Rumisberg
mgrumisberg.description: This is a website for a music club, that I am a member of. It was created with Grav.

home-dashboard.title: Home dashboard
home-dashboard.description: This is the first webapp I created. I use it at home to see the current weather and my calendar.

services.title: Services
services.description: Here you can find some of my services.

website.title: Create a website
website.description: I can create a website for you according to your wishes. In addition, I can register a domain and find a suitable hosting provider.

webapp.title: Create a webapp
webapp.description: I can create a web application for you according to your wishes. You can then use it, for example, in your company.

database.title: Database
database.description: I can create any database for you. It can be a SQL or NoSQL database.

support.title: IT Support
support.description: I can help you with your IT problems. I can help you with the installation of a new PC or I can give you information about IT topics.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact me if you have any questions or want to work with me on a project.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
